alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque; Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 9:54AM CDT until April 19 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dubuque County in northeastern Iowa... Northern Jones County in east central Iowa... Southeastern Delaware County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 954 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hopkinton, or 13 miles southeast of Manchester, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Worthington around 1005 AM CDT. Dyersville, Farley, New Vienna and New Wine Park around 1010 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Epworth, Bankston, Bankston Park, Camp Little Cloud, Lattnerville, Dubuque, Holy Cross, Graf, Five Points, Cottage Hill, East Rickardsville, Asbury and Rickardsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
